TestNote.expln: The orange line is created by the trumpet (see Note 1 below for more details).  The waveform looks alot like a sine wave at the fundamental tone shown.  The overtones and harmonics give the signal its richness and helps distinguish a trumpet from a guitar from a flute etc.  (Note 1:  Signal read from a mp3 file of someone playing the note, it is digitized voltage sent to a speaker and plotted as a function of time)
